鉚.definition: to fasten with a rivet; to rivet; to hammer in a rivet; (coll.) to concentrate one's strength

鉚上.definition: to go all out; to rise to

鉚勁兒.definition: to apply all one's strength in a burst of effort

鉚接.definition: to join with rivets; to rivet; riveted joint

鉚起來.definition: variant of 卯起來|卯起来[mao3qi3lai5]
